summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Admin Panel features for Tambola game. All backend APIs (17/17) passed. Frontend UI testing verified Create Game form, Manage Games section, Game Details modal, and status transitions. All requested features are working correctly.
passed_tests: Admin login authentication with valid credentials
Admin login rejection with invalid credentials
Admin session verification
Create Game with all required fields (name, date, time, tickets, price, prizes)
Create Game with custom ticket count (multiple of 6)
Create Game validation - rejects non-multiple of 6 tickets
Get all games list
Get game by ID
Update upcoming game
Start game (upcoming → live transition)
End game (live → completed transition)
Cannot edit live games (correctly rejected)
Delete upcoming game
Delete live game requires force flag
Admin get game tickets endpoint
Call number in live game
Get game session data
UI: Create Game form displays all fields
UI: Manage Games section shows game list with columns (Game, Date & Time, Tickets, Revenue, Status, Actions)
UI: Status badges (LIVE, COMPLETED) display correctly
UI: Progress bars for tickets sold
UI: Revenue display with ₹ symbol
UI: View Details button opens modal with stats and prizes
UI: Game Details modal shows Total Tickets, Tickets Sold, Price, Revenue, Prize Configuration
UI: Read-only indicator for completed games
UI: Live, End, Delete action buttons visible for live games
seed_data_creation: Multiple test games created during testing (prefixed with 'Test', 'API Start Test', 'UI Test', 'Start Button Test', 'Lifecycle Test')
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin Panel testing complete. All CRUD operations for games work correctly. Game lifecycle (upcoming → live → completed) transitions work via both API and UI. The View Details modal shows comprehensive game information including stats and prizes. Completed games correctly show as read-only. Start/End buttons work for appropriate game statuses.
